abstract: On Thursday, the board of the oil refiner CVR Energy urged shareholders to reject Carl C. Icahn’s $2.6 billion bid, calling the offer “inadequate.”
snippet: On Thursday, the board of the oil refiner CVR Energy urged shareholders to reject Carl C. Icahn’s $2.6 billion bid, calling the offer “inadequate.”
lead_paragraph: CVR Energy is trying to ward off Carl C. Icahn’s unwanted advances.

headline.main: CVR Energy Urges Shareholders to Reject Icahn’s Bid
